actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny the business deduction for amounts paid or incurred for lobbying before Congress or other legislative bodies.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disallow business income tax deductions for expenses incurred for lobbying before Congress or other legislative bodies.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny the business deduction for amounts paid or incurred for lobbying before Congress or other legislative bodies.
